item.title: Amitabh Bachchan Calmed Rekha, Told Her 'It's Just Acting' During 'I Hate You' Scene: 'I Hugged Amitji...' - News18
item.description:
Amitabh Bachchan Calmed Rekha, Told Her 'It's Just Acting' During 'I Hate You' Scene: 'I Hugged Amitji...'

Date: January 14, 2025

Source: News18

During the filming of the iconic movie Silsila, Rekha faced immense pressure while shooting a crucial scene. Amitabh Bachchan provided her with encouragement, drawing on the story of James Dean to help her focus.

  • Rekha described an intense scene where she had to deliver emotional lines in front of 15,000 people.
  • Amitabh Bachchan interjected with a story to calm her nerves.
  • Rekha recounted the crowd's reaction after the scene, highlighting the emotional atmosphere.
  • The pair's on-screen chemistry has led to ongoing speculation about their relationship.
‚ÄúI said to Amitji, ‚ÄòExcuse me, that really makes me feel better.‚Äô He said, ‚ÄòI don‚Äôt mean it literally, but you know what I mean, come on. This is acting‚Äô.‚Äù

The filming of Silsila remains a significant moment in the careers of Amitabh Bachchan and Rekha, revealing the pressure actors can face and the supportive relationships that can develop on set.

item.title: Madhuri Dixit buys swanky Ferrari worth ‚Çπ6 crore, goes for a ride around Mumbai with husband Shriram Nene. Watch - Hindustan Times
item.description:

Madhuri Dixit and her husband, Dr. Shriram Nene, have recently acquired a new Ferrari 296 GTS, marking a significant addition to their luxury car collection.

  • The car, worth over ‚Çπ6 crore, is a two-seater Coupe known for its performance and design.

  • She was last seen in the blockbuster film Bhool Bhulaiyaa 3, which released on November 1, 2024.

item.title: The Raja Saab postponed officially; New poster of Prabhas out now - 123telugu
item.description:
The Raja Saab officially postponed; New poster of Prabhas released

Published on: Jan 14, 2025 9:57 am IST

Recently confirmed, The Raja Saab has been postponed from its initial release date of April 10, 2025. The production team is now targeting a June 2025 release, following social media speculation about the delay.

  • The Raja Saab's release has been moved from April 10, 2025, to June 2025.
  • A new poster featuring Prabhas has been unveiled celebrating Sankranthi.
  • Malavika Mohanan makes her Telugu debut in the film, alongside Niddhi Agerwal.
  • Directed by Maruthi and produced by TG Vishwa Prasad under People Media Factory.
Happy Sankranthi Darlings ‚ù§Ô∏è
Manam yeppudu vasthe appude Asalaina Panduga‚Ä¶.Twaralo Chithakkottedham üî• #TheRajaSaab will meet you soon in theatres.
- The RajaSaab (@rajasaabmovie) January 14, 2025

The film, billed as a romantic horror comedy, is expected to attract significant attention in its revised release window.

item.title: Los Angeles Wildfires: Celebs Who Lost Their Homes In Palisades Fire 2025 - Paris Hilton To Bella Hadid - Zee News
item.description:
Los Angeles Wildfires: Celebs Who Lost Their Homes In Palisades Fire 2025

Publication Date: 2025-01-13 Source: Zee News

The Los Angeles wildfires in 2025 have caused devastation, affecting numerous homes including those of several high-profile celebrities. Below is a list of some of those who lost their residences.

  • Tina Knowles: Her Malibu sanctuary burned down.
  • Paris Hilton: Shared heartbreaking news about her Malibu beach mansion.
  • Mel Gibson: Experienced the loss of his home in the wildfires.
  • Mandy Moore: Expressed shock over the destruction of her community.
  • John Goodman: Reported that his Pacific Palisades home was destroyed.
  • Billy Crystal: Lost a home he owned since 1979 due to the fires.
  • Bella and Gigi Hadid: Their childhood home burned in Malibu.
‚ÄúI went home and I said to myself, ‚ÄòWell, at least I haven‚Äôt got any of those pesky plumbing problems anymore.'‚Äù - Mel Gibson

The impacts of these wildfires extend beyond just homes; they have deeply affected the lives of those in the community.

item.title: Ram Gopal Varma calls box office numbers of Ram Charan's Game Changer a 'fraud': 'Who‚Äôs behind this humiliating insult' - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Ram Gopal Varma Criticizes Box Office Claims of Ram Charan's Game Changer

Date: Jan 14, 2025 | Source: Hindustan Times

Filmmaker Ram Gopal Varma has publicly condemned the inflated box office numbers claimed by the makers of Ram Charan's film Game Changer, questioning the credibility of their reported figures.

  • Varma labeled the box office numbers reported by the film's producers as a 'fraud'.
  • He expressed concerns over the discrepancies between the claimed earnings and trade reports, which indicate much lower figures.
  • Varma stressed the importance of truth in film industry claims, linking the current situation to broader issues within the industry.
  • The film reportedly earned ‚Çπ186 crore on its opening day according to producers, but trade sources claim the figures may actually be below ‚Çπ100 crore.
‚ÄúI truly don‚Äôt know who‚Äôs behind this highly humiliating disgracing insult of undermining the extraordinary achievements of south‚Ä¶‚Äù - Ram Gopal Varma

In his criticism, Varma also raised questions about the film's purported budget and how it relates to its reported earnings.

item.title: Game Changer box office collection day 4: Ram Charan-Shankar‚Äôs film is in free-fall, crosses Rs 105.7 cr - The Indian Express
item.description:
Game Changer box office collection day 4: Ram Charan-Shankar‚Äôs film is in free-fall, crosses Rs 105.7 cr

Date: January 14, 2025 | Source: Indian Express

Director S Shankar‚Äôs maiden Telugu film, Game Changer, starring Ram Charan and Kiara Advani, is struggling at the box office.

  • On day four, the film collected Rs 8.5 crore additional, bringing its total to Rs 97 crore nett in India.
  • The film opened strong with Rs 51 crore on the first day but saw a decline over the weekend.
  • Competition from other film releases is significantly impacting its performance.
  • The film has suffered from piracy issues, with threats made against the producers before release.
‚ÄúDespite the film blowing hot and cold, the performances are consistently good.‚Äù - SCREEN‚Äôs Avinash Ramchandran

Game Changer's future at the box office remains uncertain as it faces continued competition and a declining audience interest.

item.title: ‚ÄòOnlyFans is destroying this generation‚Äô: Adult star Bonnie Blue claims she slept with 1,057 men in 12 hours. Watch - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Bonnie Blue Claims to Sleep with 1,057 Men in 12 Hours, Sparks Controversy

Publication Date: Jan 14, 2025 Source: Hindustan Times

Bonnie Blue, a controversial adult star, claims to have broken a world record by sleeping with 1,057 men in a single day, leading to mixed reactions on social media.

  • Her video discusses her experiences and how she coped with the encounters.
  • She defiantly announces her achievement, thanking her participants and asserting her well-being.
  • Health experts warn about the potential physical toll such actions might have.
  • The claim has sparked discussions about the influence of platforms like OnlyFans on modern society.
  • Her parents' initial disapproval of her career choice contrasts with their current support.
‚ÄúOver 1000 men in a day! Thank you to all the barely legal, barely breathing and the husbands,‚Äù - Bonnie Blue.

The claim has raised both accolades and criticisms, highlighting a broader conversation about the sex industry and its glamorization.

item.title: 'NOBODY SAID SORRY', Journos issue clarification over Vivian Dsena's claim after Bigg Boss 18 media round - Bollywood Life
item.description:
Clarification on Vivian Dsena's Media Apology Claim After Bigg Boss 18

Date: January 14, 2025
Source: BollywoodLife

Following a media round on Bigg Boss 18, controversy arose over claims made by contestant Vivian Dsena regarding alleged apologies from journalists. As discussions intensified, various parties weighed in to clarify the situation.

  • Vivian Dsena mentioned that media personnel expressed 'sorry' for their questioning after a broadcast.
  • Reporters present refuted these claims, stating no apologies were made.
  • Sonali Naik and other journalists highlighted that their teammates did not encounter any apologies during the media round.
No one said sorry https://t.co/NBLIMKgmjo
My teammate went. And NOBODY SAID SORRY! https://t.co/axkmEexE8I

The ongoing discussions reflect broader concerns about narrative framing in media coverage, inviting fans to remain cautious regarding interpretations.

item.title: Hrithik Roshan shares his handwritten notes from before Kaho Na Pyaar Hai's release: What‚Äôs changed? Absolutely nothing - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Hrithik Roshan Reflects on 25 Years Since Kaho Na Pyaar Hai Release

Date: Jan 14, 2025 Source: Hindustan Times

Actor Hrithik Roshan celebrated the 25th anniversary of his debut film Kaho Na Pyaar Hai by sharing his old handwritten notes and reflecting on his journey in the film industry.

  • Hrithik shared notes that included advice on resilience and staying true to oneself.
  • His notes contained motivational messages, including ‚ÄúOne life. That's it‚Äîonly one life, one chance.‚Äù
  • He expressed nostalgia over his nervousness prior to the film's release.
  • Hrithik's reflection concluded that despite 25 years, he feels little has changed in his approach to acting.
  • Kaho Na Pyaar Hai marked the Bollywood debut of both Hrithik Roshan and Ameesha Patel.
  • Released in 2000, the film was re-released recently in celebration of Hrithik's silver jubilee in the industry.
‚ÄúI see these pages and realise - absolutely nothing. Good thing? Bad thing? It‚Äôs just how it is.‚Äù

In conclusion, Hrithik's reflections highlight the enduring nature of his passion for acting and the ongoing journey of an artist in the film industry.

item.title: 'Fateh' box office collection day 4: Sonu Sood‚Äôs action drama sees a major drop, fails to make even Rs.1 - TOI Etimes
item.description:
Fateh' Box Office Collection Day 4: Sonu Sood‚Äôs Action Drama Sees a Major Drop

Date: October 13, 2023

Source: Times of India

On its fourth day, Sonu Sood's film 'Fateh' faced a significant decline at the box office, failing to collect even Rs. 1 crore. In contrast, Ram Charan‚Äôs movie 'Game Changer' emerged as the leader at the box office.

  • 'Fateh' struggled to attract viewers, showing a drastic drop in collections.
  • Despite strong performances by lead actor Sonu Sood, the film‚Äôs box office success was underwhelming.
  • Competition from Ram Charan‚Äôs 'Game Changer', which has been performing well, is a factor in 'Fateh's decline.
"Fateh‚Äôs collection highlights the volatile nature of box office performance, where competition can heavily influence earnings."

In conclusion, the box office landscape remains competitive, with established stars like Ram Charan drawing significant audiences away from other films, including 'Fateh'.

item.title: Horoscope Today, January 14 By Astrologer Sundeep Kochar: Aries, Unexpected Things May Occur - Zee News
item.description:
Horoscope Today, January 14 By Astrologer Sundeep Kochar: Aries, Unexpected Things May Occur

Date: January 14, 2023 Source: Zee News

Astrologer Dr Sundeep Kochar provides daily horoscope predictions, detailing insights for all twelve zodiac signs. Here's what the stars have in store for each sign today.

  • Aries: Unexpected things may occur today, making everything you've hoped for fall into place. Embrace the good that‚Äôs coming after months of hard work.
  • Taurus: Travel alone to a new place to recharge and enjoy your own company.
  • Gemini: Be the center of attention at a gathering of friends and family.
  • Cancer: Expect compliments that boost your confidence.
  • Leo: Financially stable but be prepared to help a friend in need.
  • Virgo: You‚Äôll receive recognition for managing responsibilities well.
  • Libra: A day full of good news and potential gifts.
  • Scorpio: Stay determined despite feeling low on energy.
  • Sagittarius: Maintain productivity despite a feeling of lethargy.
  • Capricorn: It's best to spend today alone for your emotional health.
  • Aquarius: Have a heart-to-heart to resolve misunderstandings.
  • Pisces: A new perspective on life will energize you.
